title: Pachi Kundan Ruby Pendant Necklace: A Touch of Hyderabad Elegance
materials: Faceted Rubies. Pachi Kundan settings with Uncut Polki Diamonds and a cabochon Ruby drop. Finished with a subtle Hyderabadi Polish for a radiant glow.
features: The pendant features intricate Pachi Kundan work, a signature Hyderabad style, with uncut Polki Diamonds that sparkle with antique charm. The central motif evokes traditional Telugu design elements. A striking cabochon ruby droplet enhances the pendant's allure. String with pearls and rubies adds delicate contrast.
colors: clear colour (Polki Diamonds). The contrast between the gold and rubies creates a rich and regal look.
occasions: Perfect for festive occasions like Diwali
and weddings. Its unique design allows for versatility
suitable for both traditional South Indian attire and modern outfits for parties and special events.
description: This Pachi Kundan pendant necklace showcases exquisite Hyderabadi craftsmanship, blending traditional techniques with contemporary design. The use of genuine rubies and natural pearls adds to its value and appeal. A timeless piece that celebrates cultural heritage and modern aesthetics, ideal for those who appreciate unique and elegant jewelry.
